nodes.text: Soid Einray was a male Sith Acolyte who served the Sith Empire around 3645 BBY. Einray was a student at the Sith academy on the frozen world of Odacer-Faustin, where he and his classmates learned under the direction of the Sith Lord Darth Scabrous. While he was in attendance at the academy, Scabrous released unakki eye spiders on the school grounds as a test to cull the weak from his ranks. Eleven students, including Einray, were blinded by the spiders' attacks. After the incident, Soid Einray hung himself.
Soid Einray was described as being "a defective" by his classmate Kindra. The injuries he received from the unakki eye spiders ultimately drove him to commit suicide.

Soid Einray's only appearance in Star Wars canon to date was Joe Schreiber's 2010 horror novel, Red Harvest. In the book, Einray garnered only a passing mention during a discussion between Sith students Kindra and Hartwig regarding unakki eye spiders.
